name: Hen Maze
description:
Play as Hilbert the chicken who has the ability to jump and switch coloured objects in a randomly generated map.

Instructions:

- Arrow keys: Move character

- Space: Jump (jump over black ditches)

- E: Change colour of certain tiles (i.e. walls and conveyor belts)

Credit to Joe for modelling the chicken in the title screen (as well as the thumbnail icon).
